update borrow_order set disabled = #{disabled,jdbcType=BIT}, uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, bues_type = #{buesType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_uid = #{userUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_uid = #{productUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_car_uid = #{bCarUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_code = #{pCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plate_number = #{plateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salesman_uid = #{salesmanUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign_time = #{signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bo_price = #{boPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bo_finish_price = #{boFinishPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bo_expect = #{boExpect,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bo_expect_unit = #{boExpectUnit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bo_paytype = #{boPaytype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bo_is_state = #{boIsState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bo_is_finish = #{boIsFinish,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bo_finish_time = #{boFinishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bo_pay_source = #{boPaySource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bo_pay_state = #{boPayState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, first_pay_time = #{firstPayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_pay_time = #{lastPayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bo_pay_expect = #{boPayExpect,jdbcType=INTEGER}, first_expect_time = #{firstExpectTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_expect_time = #{lastExpectTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_channel = #{payChannel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update borrow_order set bo_pay_expect = bo_pay_expect+1 ,bo_is_state = CASE WHEN bo_pay_expect = bo_expect THEN 6 ELSE 5 END ,first_pay_time = IFNULL(first_pay_time ,current_timestamp()) ,last_pay_time = CASE WHEN bo_is_state = 6 THEN current_timestamp() ELSE last_pay_time END WHERE order_id = #{orderId} and bo_pay_expect <bo_expect
